data.title: Unveiling the Top 24 Competitors of Appdome
data.meta_description: Uncover who are the Top 24 Appdome competitors in the market. Firms like Guardsquare and Promon provide exciting alternatives in mobile application security.
data.text:
Appdome operates in the technology industry, delivering top-notch solutions for mobile applications on iOS and Android platforms. The firm's Certified Secureâ¢ technology sets a high standard in the sector by guaranteeing secure builds and protection from injection attacks. There are various enterprises in the competitive landscape, each offering unique solutions, such as Guardsquareâs automated mobile app security testing and CriticalBlue's attestation solutions. The evolving landscape indicates a continuous need for advanced technologies to tackle emerging mobile application threats across various industries.

Top 24 Appdome competitors

1. Guardsquare

Website: guardsquare.com

Headquarters: Leuven, Vlaams-Brabant, Belgium

Founded: 2014

Headcount: 51-200

Latest funding type: Series A

LinkedIn

Guardsquare is a mobile app security company that provides solutions for automated mobile app security testing and code protection. Their offerings include ProGuard, an open-source shrinker for Java bytecode, and DexGuard, which secures Android apps and SDKs through code hardening and RASP. Guardsquare helps developers identify and fix security issues in their apps, encrypt and obfuscate code, and prevent reverse engineering and tampering. They offer comprehensive protection against security threats, with easy integration and automated security testing tools.

2. Promon

Website: promon.co

Headquarters: Oslo, Oslo, Norway

Founded: 2006

Headcount: 51-200

Latest funding type: Series Unknown

LinkedIn

Promon is a global app security company that helps businesses protect sensitive information from static and dynamic attacks. They offer app shielding solutions, including code obfuscation, encryption, and API protection, to prevent app compromise. Their clients come from various industries such as finance, health, public sector, and more.

3. CriticalBlue - Approov Mobile App Protection

Website: approov.io

Headquarters: Edinburgh, Lothian, United Kingdom

Founded: 2001

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

Approov is a leading provider of attestation solutions, ensuring the security and authenticity of mobile apps accessing backend services. By protecting against bots, tampered apps, and malicious scripts, Approov allows only genuine apps running in safe environments to use APIs and backend resources.

4. Wultra

Website: wultra.com

Headquarters: Prague, Prague, Czechia

Founded: 2014

Headcount: 11-50

Latest funding type: Seed

LinkedIn

Wultra offers cutting-edge security solutions for financial institutions across the globe. With a focus on banking and fintech apps, their specialized mobile in-app protection solution MalwarelyticsÂ® actively safeguards financial apps, provides visibility into the security landscape, and helps prevent financial fraud. They also help meet strict financial regulations such as PSD2. Wultra's solutions protect customers on mobile and web platforms without impacting user experience.

5. Pradeo

Website: pradeo.com

Headquarters: Paris, Ile De France, France

Founded: 2010

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

Pradeo is a leading provider of mobile security solutions, specializing in endpoint detection and response (EDR) and mobile application security. Their suite of solutions offers comprehensive protection for healthcare, banking, energy, government, and other industries, safeguarding sensitive data and defending against threats such as ransomware, data leakage, and phishing. Pradeo's expertise and technology ensure the security of mobile applications and devices, enabling organizations to meet data protection laws and regulatory requirements.

6. Zimperium

Website: zimperium.com

Headquarters: Dallas, Texas, United States

Founded: 2010

Headcount: 201-500

Latest funding type: Acquired

LinkedIn

Zimperium is an enterprise-focused mobile security company that empowers enterprises to secure their mobile endpoints, enabling employees to access sensitive data and mission-critical systems safely and securely.

7. AppSealing

Website: appsealing.com

Headquarters: Los Angeles, California, Korea (the Republic of)

Founded: 2000

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

AppSealing provides mobile app security solutions to prevent money theft and protect sensitive information.

8. Cobalt

Website: cobalt.io

Headquarters: San Francisco, California, United States

Founded: 2013

Headcount: 201-500

Latest funding type: Series B

LinkedIn

Cobalt.io is a company that offers comprehensive penetration testing services. They help organizations identify and fix vulnerabilities in their digital infrastructure, ensuring the security of their systems. With a team of skilled ethical hackers, Cobalt.io provides expert guidance and delivers actionable insights to improve cybersecurity.

9. TeskaLabs

Website: teskalabs.com

Headquarters: London, England, United Kingdom

Founded: 2014

Headcount: 11-50

Latest funding type: Non Equity Assistance

LinkedIn

TeskaLabs is a cyber security company that specializes in providing advanced software products to help companies meet security standards. They offer a range of solutions including mobile app security, data encryption, pseudonymization and anonymization, and GDPR compliance. With expertise in healthcare, retail, and telecommunications industries, TeskaLabs ensures cyber security and data privacy for their customers.

10. SecIron

Website: seciron.com

Headquarters: Tokyo, Japan

Founded: 2017

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

SecIron provides code-less innovative security solutions to protect mobile applications and SDKs of its clients in the financial, gaming, and healthcare industries.

11. Nubo Software

Website: nubosoftware.com

Headquarters: New York, New York, United States

Founded: 2011

Headcount: 11-50

Latest funding type: Series A

LinkedIn

Nubo Software provides Virtual Mobile Infrastructure solutions which create virtual corporate devices on employee smartphones and tablets. The company enables unlimited mobility while keeping 100% of the data on the remote secure server. Nubo runs on all virtual machines with utter security and peace of mind.

12. Corrata

Website: corrata.com

Headquarters: Co. Dublin, Dublin, Ireland

Founded: 2016

Headcount: 11-50

Latest funding type: Series Unknown

LinkedIn

Corrata provides advanced protection against mobile security threats, ensuring the privacy and security of enterprise data.

13. Saaspass

Website: saaspass.com

Headquarters: San Francisco, California, United States

Founded: 2013

Headcount: 51-200

Latest funding type: Seed

LinkedIn

SAASPASS is an identity and access management company that provides secure two-factor authentication solutions. It offers a comprehensive suite of tools for maximizing security and usability, including random password generation, mobile/web authentication, and integration with various platforms like Google Apps and Microsoft Outlook Web App.

14. Securium Solutions Private Limited

Website: securiumsolutions.com

Headquarters: Noida, Uttar Pradesh, India

Founded: 2019

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

Securium Solutions is a Cyber Security Services company that offers preventive measures to defend systems from cyber crimes and intelligent threats.

15. Seworks

Website: se.works

Headquarters: San Francisco, California, United States

Founded: 2015

Headcount: 11-50

Latest funding type: Series A

LinkedIn

SEWORKS focuses on automated offensive security to empower organizations to simulate real-world attack scenarios and discover security weaknesses in advance. Headquartered in San Francisco, CA, and backed by SoftBank Ventures Asia, Qualcomm Ventures, and others. SEWORKS provides PentomaÂ®, a fully automated web penetration testing service.

16. Avira Romania

Website: avira.com

Headquarters: Tettnang, Baden-Wurttemberg, Romania

Founded: 1986

Headcount: 51-200

Latest funding type: Acquired

LinkedIn

Avira Operations GmbH is a leading provider of security solutions for internet service providers, offering a portfolio of technologies that protect customers from malware and provide threat intelligence. Their award-winning technology, including Avira Prime and Phantom VPN Pro, ensures the security of smart homes and devices. They collaborate with partners to deliver innovative solutions and support OEM relationships worldwide.

17. Trend Micro ANZ

Website: trendmicro.com.au

Headquarters: North Sydney, Nsw, Australia

Founded: 2000

Headcount: 51-200

LinkedIn

Trend Micro is a leading provider of cybersecurity solutions, offering a comprehensive range of products and services to protect individuals, businesses, and governments from online threats. With over 30 years of innovation, Trend Micro provides maximum security and peace of mind to its customers.

18. Talsec

Website: talsec.app

Headquarters: Brno, Jihomoravsky Kraj, Czechia

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

Talsec is a cybersecurity company offering a neat package consisting of app shielding, API threat protection, client app integrity and OS integrity control, and real-time incident monitoring.

19. Licel

Website: licelus.com

Headquarters: Los Angeles, California, United States

Founded: 2011

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

Licelus.com offers powerful protection for Android and iOS apps, safeguarding applications and their environment from a diverse range of threats. They provide in-app protection and real-time threat tracking, helping businesses build trust with customers and thrive in their sector.

20. G DATA Software Benelux

Website: gdata.nl

Headquarters: Badhoevedorp, North Holland, Netherlands

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

G DATA is a leading provider of IT security solutions that protect businesses and individuals against all forms of cyber threats. Their product portfolio includes antivirus software, internet security, mobile security, and VPN software.

21. Mobilen Communications Inc

Website: mobilen.io

Headquarters: New York, New York, United States

Founded: 2021

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

Mobilen is a managed mobility services provider that offers a secure mobile network solution against sim hijacking and port-outs. With coverage from AT&T and Verizon, Mobilen ensures the highest level of customer privacy and protects financial data, intellectual property, and confidentiality.

22. Amiri Trading Enterprises S.P.C

Website: bitdefenderkey.me

Headquarters: Muscat, Seeb, Oman

Founded: 2012

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

Bitdefenderkey.me is a cybersecurity solutions provider that offers robust security products from the renowned brand of Bitdefender.

23. PT Prosperita Mitra Indonesia

Website: prosperita.co.id

Headquarters: Bekasi, Jawa Barat, Indonesia

Founded: 2008

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

PT Prosperita Mitra Indonesia is a company that specializes in IT security and provides antivirus solutions. They offer advanced antivirus software, mobile security solutions, and protection against malware and phishing. Their services cater to both personal and business sectors, ensuring the safety and security of their clients' digital assets.

24. CleverMobile Distribution

Website: clevermobile.it

Headquarters: Milano, Michigan, Italy

Headcount: 11-50

LinkedIn

CleverMobile by ComputerGross provides mobile security and data management solutions for businesses, ensuring security, visibility, optimization, and cost savings in real-time. They offer professional services, including managed file transfer and information security. With a focus on protecting sensitive data and intellectual property, their solutions are compliant and secure.

Want to find more Appdome competitors?

If you want to find more companies like Appdome that offer diverse mobile app security solutions to various industries you can do so with Inven. This list was built with Inven and there are hundreds of companies like these globally.

With Inven you'll also get to know the company's:

Ownership: Which of these are private equity backed? Which are family-owned?

Contact data: Who are the owners and CEO's? What are their emails and phone numbers?

Financials: How do these companies perform financially? What are their revenues and profit margins?

...and a lot more!
